name: openscad-openjscad-translator
description: Translates OpenSCAD syntax (http://www.openscad.org/) into OpenJsCAD syntax (http://joostn.github.com/OpenJsCad/).

scripts.build-min: browserify src/parserWrapper.js --ignore lapack  --standalone openscadOpenJscadParser | uglifyjs -c > dist/web-built.min.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-min
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master; npm version patch && npm run build-all; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master; npm version minor && npm run build-all; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master; npm version major && npm run build-all; git commit -a -m 'chore(dist): built dist/'; git push origin master --tags
